title: Lucid (01 - 04) (2010 - 2011)
description:
Lucid (01 - 04) (2010 - 2011)


Welcome to the world of LUCID, the highly anticipated, action-packed, pop-fantasy, four-issue miniseries that draws inspiration from the spy genre, Arthurian legend and 21st-century folklore! Dark forces are conspiring to prevent humankind from reaching its true potential.
